title: PBE Account
body: So I have had a PBE account for a year or two now. Just recently I haven't been able to log on. It says wrong username or password. I have done the steps to get my password back but the Email hasn't come through. Any help would be much appreciated.

replies.body: Our account team can help with PBE account recovery!  Reach out to us by filling out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we'll review your case individually.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!

Is there an ETA on the account recovery queue?  I filed a ticket nearly 24 hours ago and still haven't heard anything.  I'd like to play, but my account was apparently hacked/transferred to a different email address.
